frameset.edef: colliding, clashing with, running into, making contact with

example.parse: (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN اصطدام) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN جدار) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN كنيس) (NP (NOUN_PROP غريبة))) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN جزيرة) (NP (NOUN_PROP جربة))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN التونسية))))))) (NP-TMP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الخميس)))))

arg.g: the wall of a Gariba synagogue in the island of Djerba in Tunisia

example.arg: بجدار كنيس غريبة في جزيرة جربة التونسية
